info.title: odmObject clock

clock.description:
This odmObject describes the properties associated with clock and time.
Clock is a time information.
The Property "datetime" is using RFC3339 datetime format (e.g: "2007-04-05T14:30Z") (Time+Date+Timezone)
The Property "countdown" is the desired total seconds for countdown.
clock.name: clock

countdown.description: The desired total seconds for countdown.
countdown.name: countdown

datetime.description: Rhe date time using RFC3339 datetime format (e.g: 2007-04-05T14:30:00Z, 2007-04-05T14:30:00+09:00).
datetime.name: datetime
